text: was a district located in Okayama Prefecture, Japan. As of 2003, the district had an estimated population of 5,736 and a density of 71.07 persons per km². The total area was 80.71 km². ==Towns and villages== * Yoshii ==Merger== * On March 1, 2005 - the town of Yoshii along with the town of Bisei (from Oda District), was merged into the expanded city of Ibara. Category:Former districts of Okayama Prefecture
title: Shitsuki District, Okayama
